forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As darkness slowly drapes itself over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle breeze whispers through the streets, carrying the faint aroma of the ocean. The current temperature hovers around a mild 54 degrees, an invitation for layers—perhaps a light jacket or a cozy sweater to fend off the evening chill. The forecast for the coming day promises a sunlit embrace, with the sun's warm fingers reaching up to 67 degrees, tapering down to a relaxed 65 by midday. A soft southwest wind will add its own playful motions, teasing the leaves and rustling the pages of any unattended books amidst the city parks.

Tomorrow will reveal a delightful day where clarity reigns. The forecast suggests a departure from the marine layer, with fog retreating to allow the vibrant colors of the city to shine through. Sunny skies will offer a perfect backdrop for leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero or wandering through the eclectic streets of the Mission. Hence, donning comfortable footwear and breathable attire will serve well for those seeking to explore or savor a quiet moment over coffee at a local café. As night falls, one might enjoy the soft glimmer of city lights in the distance, each reflecting the serenity of a night slowly surrendered to the warmth of the approaching day.
